title: Daughters of Night: Possession
description: Carmen's family is being threatened by a new group of vampires, and she is forced into another battle. Only this time it's not just her life on the line. Now she must face an evil unlike any other. One that is dangerously close to consuming her, and Carmen's only hope of succeeding is in the hands of a girl she doesn't know. Will the demons inside Carmen bring her down before she and Gaviyn can save the delicate life of the mystery girl, or will they all fall over the edge into a pit of death and despair?
author: Ashley Torbeck
